        initialProbabilities - A Hashtable that is the initial probability vector of the states
        transitionMatrix - A Hashtable the transition matrix between the states
        emissionMatrix - A Hashtable that is the emission matrix between the states and the observations

      • estimateParametersUsingBaumWelchAlgorithm

        public void estimateParametersUsingBaumWelchAlgorithm(java.util.Vector<java.lang.String> states,
                                                      java.util.Vector<java.lang.String> observations,
                                                      boolean additiveSmoothing)
        Estimate the parameters of HMM which known as the learning approach for HMM
        Parameters:
        states - A Vector which is the model states
        observations - A Vector which is the model observations
        additiveSmoothing - A boolean which indicates if the function will use the smoothing value or not to avoid zero values.
